Container.Name: Fuel-Maintenance-Tracker
Container.Overview:
Fuel & Maintenance Tracker is a comprehensive vehicle management application designed to help you track fuel consumption, maintenance records, and service reminders for all your vehicles.
Key Features: - Track fuel fill-ups and calculate mileage/efficiency - Log maintenance and service history - Set up service reminders based on date or mileage - Support for multiple vehicles - Mobile-responsive design with PWA support
Container.Description: Fuel & Maintenance Tracker is a modern web application for tracking vehicle expenses and maintenance.
